description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Banking is easy with the CIBC Caribbean Mobile App! With this app, you can pay bills, transfer funds, check your balance and more in just a few steps. Simple, convenient and secure - it’s the ideal app for your everyday banking needs.

FEATURES

Transfer Funds
Transfer funds instantly between your CIBC Caribbean accounts.
Transfer funds to other local CIBC Caribbean accounts.
Send funds a third party transfer to anyone on your existing beneficiaries list in Internet Banking.

Check Balances
Check account balances on all of your eligible CIBC Caribbean products.

Review transaction history
Review details of your transaction history for deposit and credit card accounts. Your running balance is shown on your deposit accounts to help you keep track of your spending.

Easy bill payments
Pay your bills from a list of billers you have set up in Online Banking.
Use our MultiPay feature and pay up to three bills simultaneously!

Money Monitor
Set high and low balance thresholds for any one of your accounts and monitor your balance within that range.

Locator
Search or use your current location to find nearby branches and Instant Teller Machines™.

Legal
By downloading the CIBC Caribbean Mobile App, you consent to the installation of this App and to any future updates or upgrades which may be automatically installed depending upon your device or operating system’s default settings or the settings you have selected. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this App.
Accessing this App may result in additional service fees charged by your service provider. Check with your service or hardware provider if you have questions about your specific device.

Contact Information
This App is made available by CIBC Caribbean Bank Limited, Michael Mansoor Building, Warrens, St. Michael, Barbados, BB22026. To learn more, contact us at this mailing address or visit www.cibc.com/fcib/about-us/contact-us.html

LANGUAGES:
English

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

developer: City of Bridgetown Credit Union Ltd
description:
C.O.B Mobile Banking service lets you easily and securely access balance information, pay your bills, transfer funds, and check for promotions.
 
The following features are available directly from your mobile phone 24 hours a day, 7 days a week:
 
- Access available balance information on your linked accounts
- Transfer funds between your linked accounts
- Branch and ATM locator services
- Highly configurable alerts and notifications
- View exchange rates
- Mobile top ups
- Card control
- P2P payments
 
For more information of C.O.B Mobile Banking visit us at http://www.cobcreditunion.com

With this app you’ll enjoy a full banking experience in the palm of your hands. No more long lines, extended wait times or high fees. Just banking that is easy to get, simple-to-use, safe, secure, and rewarding.


With the Sagicor Bank Mobile App you can:
•	Open a bank account under 3 business days
•	Apply for loans and credit cards
•	Conduct cardless transactions at our ABMs
•	Transfer money between Sagicor Bank accounts and to accounts at other local commercial banks
•	Pay your bills
•	Check your balances
•	Complete international wire transfers
•	Open fixed deposit accounts
Plus everything else you do at traditional commercial banks.

FIND IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES BELOW

The CIBC Mobile Banking App has received the highest ranking in customer satisfaction in Canada, according to a 2021 study from J.D. Power. We’re always striving to make our app do more for you.

FEATURES

• Securely access your accounts with your fingerprint, face ID or password. 
• Apply for bank accounts or credit cards and view your application status in real time. 
• Get a snapshot of all your accounts in the same place, anytime. 
• Use Apple Pay/Google Pay or Samsung Pay at payment terminals. 
• Set up instant, post-dated or recurring payments. 
• Deposit cheques in a flash - all you need is to take a picture with your phone. 
• Send and receive money instantly with Interac e-Transfer. 
• Quickly search for branches, banking hours, bank machines and mortgage advisors near you. 
• Receive your free Equifax credit score directly in the app, without affecting your score. 
• Our Travel Tools feature a currency converter, helpful tips and emergency numbers for while you’re away. 
• Our Virtual Assistant is available 24/7 to answer your banking questions and is able to perform everyday banking transactions on your behalf. 

LANGUAGES 

Supports English and French 

PRIVACY 
 
Your privacy and security comes first. Learn more about how CIBC is committed to protecting you by visiting https://www.cibc.com/en/privacy-security.html. 

LEGAL 

By downloading the CIBC Mobile Banking App you consent to the installation of this App and to any future updates or upgrades which may be automatically installed depending upon your device or operating system’s default settings or the settings you have selected. The app (including any updates or upgrades) may: (i) cause your device to automatically communicate with our servers to deliver the features and functionality described in the app description or through new features as they are introduced, and to record usage metrics; (ii) collect, use and disclose personal information as set out in our Privacy Policy; and (ii) affect preferences or data stored on your device. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this App. For assistance, contact CIBC at the mailing address below. 

CONTACT 

For your banking questions, please visit: https://www.cibc.com/en/contact-us.html. 

Telephone Banking: 1-800-465-2422 

Address: CIBC Head Office, 81 Bay Street, CIBC Square, Toronto, Ontario, Canada M5J 0E7 

Website: http://www.cibc.com

Keep up with your finances wherever you are or whatever you’re doing. With the RBC® Caribbean* app, accessing your money when you need it has never been easier. Want to check up on your accounts? Just sign in and see your latest transactions. Have a bill to pay? It only takes a few seconds. You get the idea. Do what you need to do—quickly and securely—and get on with your day.

Mobile Banking is available to clients everywhere in the Caribbean**.

Here’s what you can do:

•	View account balances and transaction history 
•	Make payments to your RBC credit card***
•	Move money between your RBC accounts
•	Pay bills (certain regions)
•	Send money to other local RBC clients
•	Send money internationally with wire transfers (certain regions)
•	Send money to other local banks (certain regions)
•	View and make contributions to investment products (certain regions)
•	Approve payments and transfers (certain regions)
•	View Electronic Statements (certain regions)
•	Communicate with RBC through secure messaging (certain regions)
•	Find RBC branches and ATMs
•	Get Alerts and notifications about your accounts
•	And much more!

Here’s how we keep you safe:

SECURITY
Rest easy knowing that you’re protected from unauthorized transactions**** in the RBC Caribbean app by the Online and Mobile Banking Security Guarantee.

PRIVACY
The RBC Caribbean app might need to access device services for certain features, like finding nearby RBC Royal Bank® branches. For a full list of the features, check out www.caribbeandigital.rbc.com.

For help removing the RBC Caribbean app from your device, there are instructions at www.caribbeandigital.rbc.com or you can contact caribbeanmobile@rbc.com.

You can get more information about RBC digital channel privacy at http://www.rbcroyalbank.com/caribbean/privacy-and-security/index.html

Contact information for RBC Royal Bank is available at http://www.rbcroyalbank.com/caribbean/mobile/contact-us.html

LEGAL
When you select to install the RBC Caribbean app, you’re consenting to any future updates or upgrades. Depending on your device, operating system or user-initiated settings, these might be automatically installed. You’re able to withdraw your consent by uninstalling the RBC Caribbean app from your device.

If you download the RBC Caribbean app, you must review, and are subject to, the terms & conditions of the Electronic Banking Agreement.


* The RBC Caribbean app is operated by Royal Bank of Canada.
** Royal Online gold accounts are currently not supported.
*** Credit card payments from the RBC Caribbean app are not currently available in Grenada.
**** For a definition of an unauthorized transaction & for full details regarding the protections and limitations of the RBC Security Guarantee for Online and Mobile Banking, please see your Electronic Banking Agreement (http://www.rbcroyalbank.com/caribbean/eba/electronic-banking-agreement.html) with the applicable entity.

®/™ Trademarks of Royal Bank of Canada. RBC and Royal Bank are registered trademarks of Royal Bank of Canada.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

description:
Experience the new era of digital banking with Co-Optima by BPWCCUL—built for your lifestyle, your schedule, and your security.
With a sleek new design and powerful features, Co-Optima puts you in control of your finances anytime, anywhere.

Top Features:
•	Card Controls: Instantly lock and unlock your card for added security
•	Travel Notifications: Set alerts for worry-free banking abroad
•	Real-Time Alerts: Stay up-to-date on all account activity
•	Fast Transfers & Bill Payments: Move money quickly and easily
•	Enhanced Security: Biometric login, two-factor authentication & fraud protection
•	24/7 Account Access: Manage your money wherever life takes you

Whether you’re checking your balance, paying bills, or transferring funds, Co-Optima makes it seamless.

Download now and experience banking reimagined.

Our new Republic Mobile app makes your Mobile Banking experience better and easier!
This app is available to you whenever, wherever to make your everyday banking even easier.
With RepublicMobile BB you can do so much like:
• You can view all your account balances and eStatements
• Transfer funds between your personal accounts
• Transfer funds to Third Party Republic Bank and even other local Bank accounts
• Send Cardless Cash transactions for safe and convenient withdrawals at the ATM
• Make real time payments to your credit card and also Third-Party credit card within Republic Bank
• Pay your loans
• Make utility bill payments such as insurance, internet, cellphones and other utility bills
• Place a stop on cheque(s)
We also have an exciting new feature which is our Peer to Peer (P2P) Payments where you can:
• Request a collection of funds
• Transfer via your contact on your phone
You can also register for RepublicOnline using this very app!   Download and sign up today!

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

The Remitly app offers financial services that transcend borders, enabling family and friends to send money abroad easily. Choose from convenient delivery with approximately 470,000 cash pickup options worldwide including various currencies provided, and over 5 billion bank accounts and mobile wallets. Recipients don’t pay a fee. 

Remitly is secure and fast, with great exchange rates in 100+ currencies–no fees for recipients and low fees for sending. With guaranteed delivery time and real-time transfer updates, you’ll know the exact date and time your money will arrive with your recipient. Transfers arrive on time, or we’ll refund your fees.

Safe, secure, fast transfers:
• Multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected

•Send a transfer to approximately 470,000 cash pickup options worldwide including various currencies provided, including Cebuana Lhuillier, Palawan Pawnshop, Afro International, Caribe Express, Allied Bank, Ria Money Transfer, Mukuru, Easypay, Éxito, Bancos del Barrio, Banque du Caire, Himbol Financial Services, Yonna Foreign Exchange Bureau, Banco Atlantida, Cash Plus, Wafacash, Banque Zitouna, ZB Bank and more

Remitly helps you send money worldwide and pay using your bank account, credit card, or debit card. Thanks to Remitly’s great rates, special offers, and no hidden fees, more money makes it home to friends and family. Remitly uses multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected. We’re here to help 24/7. You can talk to us or search the Help Center for support in 18 languages.

Download the Remitly app and send money today.

Remitly has offices around the globe. Remitly Global, Inc. is located at 401 Union Street, Suite 1000, Seattle, WA 98101.

Referrals must be new Remitly users and additional send requirements may be required for rewards to apply. Earn rewards for up to 20 successful referrals. Click here for program details (https://www.remitly.com/gb/en/home/referral-program-tnc).

Gate is committed to providing secure and reliable trading services for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over4,000 cryptocurrencies. With over 12 years of industry experience and 44 million users, Gate has become the preferred platform for crypto investors worldwide. 

A full-range crypto exchange with everything you want to trade. BTC, ETH, XRP, HBAR, MOODENG, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, EOS, CRV, ORDI, TAO, LTC, SHIB, JASMY, ENA, SEI, AVAX, RATS, XLM, FTM, APEPE, XRP5L, POL, RSR, FIL, ALGO, CFX, BCH, ETC, SUNDOG, KAIA, PNUT, BNB, NEAR, MAF, BAN, EML, BIGTIME, TOKEN, VIRTUAL, TIA, SATS, BOME, UNI, OM, and over4,000 more assets.

A full-featured crypto exchange offering all the top products in one place.
• Spot Trading: Supports full-range assets — including newly-listed tokens, margin trading, BRC-20, AI, MEME, RWA, DePin, ETH2.0 staking, ETFs, 5x leveraged ETFs, Layer 2, platform tokens, DeFi, and more.
• Futures:
Perpetuals, delivery contracts and more — covering 100+ markets with 0 maker fees. Enjoy points redemption and various rewards.
• Alpha:
Gate Alpha provides one-click access to all on-chain assets, supporting the widest range of tokens with minute-level listing speed. Earn Alpha points through holding and trading, which can be used to participate in token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events, unlocking additional benefits.
• Web3:
A new Web3 portal through which you can explore Gate Layer, Gate Perp DEX, Gate Fun, Meme Go, Web3 Launchpad, and more, and dive straight into the on-chain world.
• Launchpool:
Stake GT, USDT, ETH, and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Hourly airdrops, low entry, and high yield help you seize new market opportunities easily.
• CandyDrop:
Complete simple tasks like trading, depositing or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and join lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barrier and huge rewards.
• HODLer:
Hold just 1 GT to automatically receive airdrops from multiple projects, with no lockups or extra actions required. Simply hold, and earn.
• Launchpad:
Access early-stage, high-quality token launches and share the upside. Strict screening ensures quality, and fair mechanisms protect your participation rights.
• Earn:
Offers a variety of wealth-management products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Funds, Crypto Loan, and more. Stake BTC, ETH, and GT to earn higher APR. VIP users enjoy extra benefits.
• Bots:
Supports a full range of trading bots across spot and futures, including Grid Bot, Martingale Bot, Smart Rebalance Bot, Arbitrage Bot, Inter-Exchange Arbitrage Bot, Infinite Grid, Margin Grid, CTA-Expert Bot, Signal Bot, and more.
• Copy Trading:
Gate Copy Trading allows users to instantly replicate the spot and futures trades of professional traders or lead traders, enabling rapid execution of trading strategies with an overall position synchronization rate of up to 99.99%.
• Community:
Stay at the forefront of crypto news and discussions with Gate Community. Explore real-time updates, live streams, and hot-topic chats to catch upcoming events and breaking news.

- First exchange to commit to 100% Proof of Reserves
Gate's reserves cover over 200 digital assets, leveraging Merkle trees and zero-knowledge proof technology to fully secure user funds, with an excess reserve exceeding $11.676 billion.
- Premium experience with 24/7 support
We provide 24/7 customer support, allowing users to contact Gate anytime through support channels for the best service experience. For any inquiries, you can email us at: support@gate.com.

Join Our Community
X: https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

Streamline your business with Bookipi’s award-winning invoice maker.

Join over 2,500,000 businesses in 150+ countries who trust Bookipi to manage invoicing, estimates, and payments—risk-free for your first 3 documents.

What Can Businesses Do on Bookipi with Invoice Maker & Estimates App?

Bookipi’s invoice app simplifies your business accounting by automating invoices, estimates, and payment tracking.

• Quick & Easy Invoice Maker App:
Build branded, professional invoices, quotes, and receipts in under two minutes.

• Automated Payment Tracking:
Stay on top of your income with real-time notifications when invoices are sent, viewed, paid, or overdue.

• Smart Reminders & Fast Payments:
Bookipi automatically nudges clients so you get paid on time. Accept payments via credit cards, PayPal, and contactless payments.

• Effortless Tax and Reporting:
Generate organised PDF reports by month, customer, or item for easy accounting and tax filing.

• Universal Compatibility:
Perfect for freelancers, contractors, and small businesses in any industry—invoice for services, products, or milestones.

• Seamless Proposals & Recurring Billing:
Create proposals, convert them to invoices, and automate recurring invoices for ongoing clients.

• Secure & Synced:
ISO 27001 certified cloud protection with multi-device sync between mobile and web.

• Tap to Pay on iPhone - Available to All in USA, UK & Australia
Turn your phone into a wireless terminal to accept in-person, contactless payments with just a tap.

• Best Available Payment Methods
Get paid via American Express, Visa, MasterCard, PayPal and more. Process invoices, send instant receipts, and manage transactions on one app.

• One-click Receipt Maker
Send receipts right after recording a payment, keeping your clients updated and your records organised without any extra steps.

Why Use Bookipi Invoice Maker & Estimate App?

Bookipi is the best flexible, all-in-one invoice generator for freelancers and small businesses. We help streamline the sales process from invoice building to receiving payment.

How Secure is Your Data on Bookipi?

Bookipi free invoice maker runs securely on the cloud, with your data backed up and protected from third parties. Your information is locked behind your secure login credentials, and Bookipi ensures your privacy with industry-leading security practices, including ISO 27001 certification and regular audits.

Who is Bookipi for?
• Trades (builders, electricians, plumbers, etc.)
• Creative freelancers & consultants
• Food/gig delivery, e-commerce, retail, contractors
• Anyone who wants simple and professional billing

Other Features for Better Invoices, Estimates, and Receipts

• Automatic sync between devices and web app.
• Invoice hours worked, services, products, or by milestone.
• Charge credit card surcharges to clients.
• Import customer details from the contact list.
• Make calls or send emails directly from the customer list.
• Send overdue payment reminders.

Try Bookipi today and experience the easiest way to send invoices, create estimates, collect payments, and grow your business—all from your iOS device.

Bookipi is constantly updating its free invoice app and developing new features. If you have any problems or suggestions, chat with us on our website: https://bookipi.com/

Privacy Policy: https://bookipi.com/privacy-policy/

The Sagicor Go mobile app allows you to manage your life insurance policy conveniently anywhere from your mobile device. If you are an existing Sagicor customer in Antigua & Barbuda, Barbados, Belize, Dominica, Grenada, St. Kitts, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines, and Trinidad and Tobago, you’ll have full access to all the app’s features.
With this app you will be able to:

> Get convenient access to your policy information
> Check your premium payment status
> Update your contact details, 
> Find a Sagicor location near you and 
> Get more information about Sagicor’s products and services. 

As a Sagicor Go mobile app user, you will also be one of the first to know about our offers and promotions. Plus, we will be adding new features to the app regularly so stay tuned.

Need help? View our support page or email us at eservice@sagicor.com or call 1 800 744 7707.

FEATURES:

VIEW YOUR POLICY 
Access your life insurance policy, see your latest premium payment, cash value, connect with your Sagicor advisor, and even change your contact information

STAY CONNECTED TO OUR AGENCY NETWORK
If something unexpected occurs or you have a question, easily find an agency near you. 

FIND A SAGICOR LOCATION
Premium due? Need to make a payment? Find a Sagicor location near you. 

BE THE FIRST TO KNOW
Never miss a Sagicor offer or promotion again. As a Sagicor mobile app user you will be one of the first to know about new products and promotions. Get access to exclusive content on our products and services and advice on managing your finances.

APP AVAILABILITY:
The Sagicor Go app is for everyone. If you are an existing Sagicor customers in Antigua & Barbuda, Barbados, Belize, Dominica, Grenada, St. Kitts, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines, and Trinidad and Tobago, you’ll have full access to all the app’s features.
Even if you are not a Sagicor customer you can still use the app to find out about our exciting offers, find a Sagicor location near you or connect with one of our agencies to sign up for a product or service.
TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
All access to and use of this app is subject to and governed by the Sagicor Go mobile app Terms and Conditions & the Sagicor Privacy Policy.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Scotiabank is more colourful than ever with a whole new look and logo. The first time you sign in to the new app, you'll need your ScotiaCard number and your password.

Please note that this app gives you access to Scotiabank accounts held in the following countries: Dominican Republic, Bahamas, Barbados, Jamaica, Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands, and Cayman Islands. For information about our services in other countries, visit www.scotiabank.com.

Serious about your security
Your money is protected by multiple layers of security. Data encryption keeps your financial information safe, multi-factor authentication verifies your identity, and notifications keep you aware of your transactions.

Move your money faster
You can complete transfers between your accounts or to others with just a swipe.
You can add or delete your transfer recipients.

Pay your bills easily
You can add or delete bill payees, and pay your bill in a few simple steps.
Add/Delete third party transfer recipients.
Update your contact information.
Download account statements.
Download and share receipts for your bill payments and third party transfers.

Find the answers you need
With a menu at your fingertips and a fully searchable help section, the app has the answers you need and the shortcuts to take you there.


Barrier-free banking
From dynamic font sizing to VoiceOver compatibility, the new app was designed with everyone in mind.


With our app you can:
- Enrol in mobile banking if you haven't yet
- Use fingerprint or Face ID for fast and secure access
- Create a Username
- View accounts and transactions
- Transfer money between your accounts, to other Scotiabank customers, or to your friends and family at another bank
- Pay bills or top up your mobile phone
- Manage your Scotiabank Alerts
- Lock and control your credit cards
- Get answers to common questions around banking
- Send us your feedback

Important
By pressing the button above or by downloading the mobile app published by Scotiabank, you consent to the installation of this app and to future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting this app, or get instructions on how to remove or disable the Scotiabank mobile app by contacting us at the address below.


The Scotiabank mobile app lets you manage, move, and monitor your money using your mobile phone.

When you download or update this app, or when you apply for, enrol in, or use a service through mobile banking, we may collect information about your computer or device, operating system, internet connection or telephone account, settings, IP address and device locational data, and transaction data, as well as personal information.

We may collect, use, disclose, and retain this information as set out in the Scotiabank Privacy Agreement (https://jm.scotiabank.com/about-scotiabank/connect-with-scotiabank/privacy.html) and to determine which settings are appropriate for your computer system, to provide or enhance digital functionality and banking options, and for security purposes, internal analysis, and reporting.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

The Bitcoin.com Wallet is a multichain, self-custody Bitcoin and cryptocurrency wallet.
Key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want.

SECURE ACCESS
Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP
Automatically back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. 

CUSTOMISABLE FEES
You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. 

WIDGETS
Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track cryptocurrencies throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES
Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL
Send a payment link to anyone using any messaging app. Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

CUSTOMISABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY
Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

Coinbase Wallet is now Base — with a new experience coming soon. One place to create, trade, and earn with the entire global onchain community. You can continue using the same Coinbase Wallet features in Base.

Base is your home for exploring crypto and the onchain ecosystem. Base is a secure onchain wallet and browser that puts you in control of your crypto, NFTs, DeFi activity, and digital assets.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), USD Coin (USDC), Avalanche (AVAX), Polygon (MATIC), BNB Chain (BNB), Optimism (OP), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE) and all Ethereum-compatible chains.

Welcome to the world of crypto
• Base is your gateway onchain: earn monthly rewards by holding USDC onchain, earn yield with DeFi, collect NFTs, join a DAO, and more
• Easily go from cash to crypto with more ways to pay • Stay up to date on the latest trends, including major price movements, top coins, trending assets & more
• Available in 25 languages and >170 countries, so you can say “hello” to onchain in your preferred language

*NEW* Earn rewards with USDC*
Stablecoin rewards: Eligible Base users can earn up to 4.1% APY just by holding USDC in your wallet. This means your funds remain liquid, accessible anytime.

Support for millions of tokens and a whole world of onchain apps
• Access an ever-growing list of tokens and decentralized apps
• Securely store, send and receive Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH), popular assets like Litecoin (LTC), and all ERC-20 tokens
• NFTs that you own are automatically added to your wallet

Industry-leading security
• Base keeps your crypto and data safe so you can explore the decentralized web with confidence
•  Support for cloud backups of passkeys and your recovery phrase help you avoid losing your assets if you lose your device or misplace your recovery phrase
• Additional security features help protect you from malicious sites and phishing scams

It’s our mission to bring the best of the onchain ecosystem to as many people as possible.
--
*USDC Rewards are offered at Coinbase’s discretion. You can opt out at any time. The rewards rate is subject to change and can vary by region. Customers will be able to see the latest applicable rates directly within their wallets if eligible. 

**Returns aren’t guaranteed. While loans are backed by collateral, there are still risks.
Find us on X and Farcaster: @CoinbaseWallet

Where does all your money go? Exactly where you tell it to!


“We started YNAB January 1st with $37 saved and ended the year with $42,000. Plus we paid $14,000 cash for a new roof.”
-Kyle, YNAB user since 2020


If you’re like the average YNABer (just AVERAGE), you’ll save $600 in the first two months. And $6,000 in the first year. But you might experience something much more powerful than a growing bank account balance or paid off credit cards: 92% of YNABers report feeling less stressed since starting YNAB.


“YNAB has removed the stress of money from my life and in doing so has helped make me a better husband. It's like I got to remove a personal flaw I had never been able to fix."
-Kyle, again. We didn’t even pay him to say this, but maybe we should.


Every dollar represents you—it’s the product of your energy. You work too hard for all that to go to waste. We’ll show you how to give every dollar a job, so your paychecks are working toward your priorities and values, your wants and needs, your work and your play. Your money is your life. Spend it well with YNAB.

Start your one-month free trial today!

Features:
BUILT FOR PARTNERS & FAMILIES
-Up to six people can share budgets on one YNAB subscription
-Simplifies sharing finances with a partner
-Cheaper than couples counseling


PAY OFF YOUR DEBT
-Loan planner tool
-Calculate time and interest saved 
-A debt-paying community to cheer you on


IMPORT TRANSACTIONS AUTOMATICALLY
-Securely link financial accounts to bring in transactions
-Option to add transactions manually
-Experience the oddly satisfying routine of categorizing transactions


NO ADS
-Privacy protection
-No in-app ads
-No third-party product pitching. Ew.


VIEW YOUR FINANCIAL PICTURE ALL IN ONE PLACE
-Net worth report
-Spending breakdown
-Income vs expense report


SET & REACH GOALS FASTER
-Track expenses
-Set spending targets
-Visualize progress as you go


REAL HELP FROM REAL HUMANS
-Award-winning support team
-Free live workshops
-Real people (who aren’t perfect either)


“My wife and I can attest to the fact that the average budgeter saves around $600 in 2 months. We did! We love everything about YNAB except that WE DIDN’T START SOONER!!!!!!!!!”
-Gideon, YNAB user since 2019

"I never, ever thought I'd see this, and yet here it is: CREDIT CARD BEAST DEFEATED!”
-@taber

“I’m sleeping better now. Our arguments about money have magically evaporated.”
-Jonathan, YNABer (former Mint user)


"My fiance and I will be paying for our wedding without any loans because of YNAB."
-@Thai_Jonny

“A year of YNAB costs less than a massage and is a heck of a lot better for reducing stress.”
-Kat, YNAB user since 2016


Your money is your life. Spend it well with YNAB. 

Free for 30 Days, then Monthly/Annual Subscriptions Available

Subscription Details
-YNAB is a one-year auto-renewable subscription, billed monthly or annually.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a
subscription to that publication, where applicable.
